item.description:
This Sunday night, December 23rd The Bernadettes, along with several other bands, will be performing at the Dawn Hochsprung Memorial Fund Benefit Concert to be held at Marisa's, located at 6540 Main St., Trumbull, CT, their phone: 203-459-4225. This event will be one of several charity events we will be involved with to benefit the victims and families of last week's terrible tragedy in Newtown.  This show is still in it's formative stage, so more info maybe forthcoming, but we wanted to get the word out...show starts at 6:00 PM, $10 cover charge, everyone asked to wear "green", one of the school colors of Sandy Hook Elementary School, all proceeds to go to the Dawn Hochsprung Memorial Fund.  No doubt we all know who Dawn is, the hero school principal at Sandy Hook Elementary School who so selflessly gave her life to protect her students that fateful day, this fund was established by Dawn's family in her memory.  As of now, four of the area's top party bands are scheduled to perform: Remember September, Pocket Full Of Soul, Primetime Band, and of course yours truly...more acts maybe added in the near future.  A Facebook eventpage has been created for this show and it's suggested that all of you who do the Facebook thing should join this event to check for updates!  The Bernadettes are scheduled to go on around the 9:00 or 10:00 time frame, but this is subject to change, so just show up at 6:00 and check out all the great bands...there's gonna be some fabulous music, add Marisa's tasty Italian cuisine and way hip upscale, uptown party vibe, big dance floor, this will no doubt be the area's hottest holiday party around...all for a $10 donation for an incredibly wonderful cause...and very likely, many of you have to day off on Monday, Christmas Eve, so come on out!!!

Marisa's website: http://marisastrumbull.com/

Dawn Hochsprung Memorial Fund Benefit Concert Facebook event page

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Dawn Hochsprung Memorial Fund Benefit Concert to be held at Marisa's
